industry: Construction and Glass, Ceramics and Concrete Manufacturing
description:
The Replenishment Manager will play a crucial role in ensuring that internal and external customers are supplied with the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for optimizing inventory levels, implementing effective replenishment strategies, and collaborating with various departments, interface with carriers and suppliers to maximize efficiency. You will oversee order fulfillment operations, ensuring efficient and accurate order processing and delivery.

Responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain inventory replenishment plans to meet customer demand
• Tender loads to the carriers based on requirements and control the execution of the transportation plan
• Monitor inventory levels and make data-driven decisions
• Manage and optimize all aspects of order fulfillment

Necessary Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree in business Admin, Engineering, or similar field
• Relative experience / industry knowledge i.e: Replenishment, inventory planning, transportation planning, fulfillment, S&OP, Demand planning, network design

Plusses:
• Industry knowledge: building materials, perishable goods, quick moving materials
• MBA
• Lean Six Sigma
• Supply Chain Certification of relative certifications
